# Documentation Issue – Interaction Guide

## Purpose

Use this template to improve **clarity, accuracy, or completeness** of
documentation.

Documentation is part of the product.

---

## When to Use This Template

Check all that apply:

- [ ] Documentation is unclear or confusing
- [ ] Content is missing or outdated
- [ ] Instructions are incorrect or incomplete

---

## Required Sections

### 1️⃣ Documentation Area

Confirm:

- [ ] The affected document or section is identified
- [ ] A link or path is provided

---

### 2️⃣ Issue Description

Verify:

- [ ] The problem is clearly explained
- [ ] The impact on the reader is described

---

### 3️⃣ Suggested Improvement

Optional but encouraged:

- [ ] Proposed wording or structure
- [ ] Example or clarification

---

### 4️⃣ Target Audience

Select all that apply:

- [ ] Developer
- [ ] Platform Engineer
- [ ] Security / Compliance
- [ ] Operations
- [ ] Product / Program

---

## Quality Checklist

- [ ] Issue is specific
- [ ] Scope is clear
- [ ] No sensitive information included

---

## What Happens Next

- [ ] Documentation is reviewed
- [ ] Updates are applied or queued
- [ ] Issue is closed with reference
